# Comparison between references

## Define reference annotations
```{bash, eval=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
ref_ensembl_103='data/refs/annotations/ensembl/Gallus_gallus.GRCg6a.103.gtf'
ref_ncbi='data/refs/annotations/ncbi/GRCg6a_ncbi2ucsc_NL.gtf'
ref_ucsc_refGene='data/refs/annotations/ncbi/galGal6.refGene.gtf'
ref_ucsc_ensGene='data/refs/annotations/ncbi/galGal6.ensGene.gtf'
ref_ucsc_ncbiRefSeq='data/refs/annotations/ncbi/galGal6.ncbiRefSeq.gtf'
```

## Venn Diagrams
All Venn diagrams are produced via Intervene. This tool is based on `bedtools interset`.
Euler diagrams are obtained with `eulerr`.

```{bash, eval=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
intervene venn -i ${ref_ensembl_103} ${ref_ncbi} ${ref_ucsc_refGene}
	--output ./output/venn_diagrams/3refs
	–save-overlaps True
	–figtype png
	–bedtools-options -f=0.8 -r
```
